page.title: 02Farming - General
page.content: Farming has been the main occupation in this area for more than a thousand years.There are 5 farms here- Trevessen (about 90 acres) Cultivated farmland grass for hay and silage, keeping beef cattle. Boswinger (about 200 acres) Cultivated farmland grass for hay and silage and also corn. Tregavarras (about 90 acres)Much rough grazing;some cultivated farmland,grass for hay and silage also corn and potatoes.Dairy farming-Friesians and South Devons. Caerhays (about 500 acres) Much woodland and cliff grassland but some Cultivated land in grass and corn. Mainly sheep with a few highland cattle. Treveor (234 acres) In tensively managed grassland and some barley. Dairy hero of Friesians.
